bwwExcerpt: How much would you be able to accomplish if the limits of time did not exist? Would you search for higher meaning, a better understanding of the world and the people in it, or simply get a bit out-of-hand and reckless? So much can happen in an instant, and if we could turn back time (feel free to sing that line, btw), there's little doubt we'd all change something about our actions in the past.
